Uses of Class
xxl.core.indexStructures.Sphere

  • Packages that use Sphere 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

    • Uses of Sphere in xxl.core.indexStructures

      The sphere containing data.

      Sphere MTree.sphere(Object entry)
      Returns the descriptor of entry as a sphere.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
